name: ボンバーマン64
summary:
Bomberman 64 (ボンバーマン64 Bonbāman Rokujūyon) is a Japanese Nintendo 64 game of the Bomberman franchise.
It is based more on the SNES Bomberman titles, and is fully 2D without any 3D graphics. It includes "Panic Bomber" mode from the SNES Bomberman games. It also includes a mini-game called "Same Game" which is a tile matching 2D puzzle game focused on eliminating blocks.
"Bomberman Mode" features standard Bomberman gameplay, but also features multiple exits per room, and thus a branching paths. Multiplayer also features "Tandem Mode", where two players work together. Up to four players can play multi-player mode.
